verses.name: Luke 12:26
verses.text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least, why take ye thought for the rest?

verses.name: Luke 12:27
verses.text: Consider the lilies how they grow: they toil not, they spin not; and yet I say unto you, that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.

verses.name: Luke 12:28
verses.text: If then God so clothe the grass, which is to day in the field, and to morrow is cast into the oven; how much more will he clothe you, O ye of little faith?
